英文法規名稱: Regulations Governing Announcement Methods of Trust Enterprises about Asset Trust from Political Parties or Political Organizations
中文法規名稱: 信託業辦理政黨政治團體財產信託公告辦法
沿革內容:
1. Promulgated on November 13, 2000
2. Amended on December 18, 2009

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations are enacted pursuant to Paragraph 3, Article 22 of the Trust Enterprise Act.

The term “asset trust from political parties or political organizations” as used in these Regulations shall mean a political party or other political organization declaring its property to the trust of a trust enterprise.

After a trust enterprise has accepted asset trust from a political party or political organization, if the trust agreement entered therebetween is revoked, terminated or has changes to any of the items provided under subparagraphs of Article 3 herein, the trust enterprise shall, within ten (10) days after the change, revocation or termination of the agreement, publicly announce the reason(s) and date for the change, revocation or termination in a local newspaper or in a manner designated by the Competent Authority, and report same to the competent authority administering over political parties or other political organizations for recordation, and send a copy of the same to the Competent Authority
These Regulations shall take effect on the date of promulgation.
